testsuite.name: Colorlib

testcase.name: Verify the completion of the Block Validation screen
Check message when sending the empty form
Check the format of the email field
Check the format of the password field
Check the format of the confirm password field
Check the format of the url field
Check the format of the only digits field
Check the format of the range field
